com.stripe.stripeterminal

Class ReadReusableCardParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReadReusableCardParameters

  • public class ReadReusableCardParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameters for reading a reusable card. **NOTE: Most integrations should **not** use Terminal.readReusableCard(com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReadReusableCardParameters, com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderDisplayListener, com.stripe.stripeterminal.PaymentMethodCallback).** You should create a PaymentIntent and use the associated Terminal.collectPaymentMethod(com.stripe.stripeterminal.PaymentIntent, com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderDisplayListener, com.stripe.stripeterminal.PaymentIntentCallback) and Terminal.processPayment(com.stripe.stripeterminal.PaymentIntent, com.stripe.stripeterminal.PaymentIntentCallback) methods if you are simply collecting a payment from a customer. You can use Terminal.readReusableCard(com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReadReusableCardParameters, com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderDisplayListener, com.stripe.stripeterminal.PaymentMethodCallback) to read payment details and defer payment for later. The PaymentMethod created by this method will have type card, suitable for use with online payments. Note that if you use this method to defer a payment, the transaction will *not* receive the beneficial rates and liability shift associated with card present transactions. https://stripe.com/docs/terminal/online-payments
